 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גִּבֵּן‎</span> **adjective** ==crook-backed, hump-backed== (compare Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎גְּבִין‎</span> ***id.***, Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גַּבָּן‎</span> ***highlander***; also Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גבין‎</span>, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎גבינא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhPQAdAIAAAP///wAAACH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAA9AB0AAAKKhI+py+3fQoC0Qpkktrzr/DHa2Fkk6IxhSa3HJqoT28KAu3zTTD94D0zZgsTc8MYrAnE/hUppTCKlThm1yDyiZNBXFhVZNTknL+jq5T1p6ymGa+W60RdS/I7XyU3v/M5vNacVg/A05mO4F0ZHFBgY1hWzphjJN1lW6XHJmIn42NnTBjpKWmp62lkAADs=">, all = ***brow*** (***eye-brow***, etc.); compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***side of forehead***), [[Lev.21.20|Lev 21:20]].
